title: Lily Allen and Stranger Things star David Harbour confirm romance with PDA
text:

Lily Allen and Stranger Things star David Harbour have confirmed their relationship after months of speculation.

The couple were spotted putting on a very cosy PDA as they were snapped wandering around New York City on Sunday morning.

David, 44, grabbed his new girlfriend for a smooch on her cheek as they walked through the Downtown Manhattan area during the casual outing.

Lily, 31, then beamed as she pulled him in closer for a big kiss on the lips.

She looked relaxed in a grey jumper with flared sleeves, which she wore with a pair of baggy jeans and trainers.

(Image: LRNYC / MEGA)

The mum-of-two teamed the look with a quilted purple Chanel handbag and a pair of chunky heart-shaped earrings.

David sported a blue bomber jacket, a matching t-shirt and grey tousers, which he sported with a pair of brown trainers.

The pair were first linked back in August and she supported him backstage at SNL over the weeknd.

(Image: LRNYC / MEGA)

(Image: NETFLIX)

He is best known Jim Hopper in the Netflix series Stranger Things.

Lily was previously married to Sam Cooper for four years before they split up in 2015.

Their divorce was finalised in 2018.

(Image: LRNYC / MEGA)

She is mum to daughters Ethel, seven, and Marnie, six, sharing joint custody with Sam.

Lily dated MC Meridian Dan, real name Daniel Lawrence, for three years before breaking up at the end of 2018.

David was in a relationship with Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them actress Alison Sudol up until earlier this year.
description: The couple have been rumoured to have been together for months and finally confirmed their romance on Sunday
